layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x36
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x36
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x20 [bgcolor=#FF0000]
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 317x19
          text run at (0,0) width 317: "This line should be green and there should be no red."
